summary: The VA Employee Fairness Act of 2025 (S. 1650) aims to amend Title 38 of the United States Code, specifically Section 7422, regarding collective bargaining for employees within the Veterans Health Administration. The bill's primary action involves modifying the existing authorities on collective bargaining. It strikes existing subsections dealing with this topic and re-designates subsections. It clarifies that the changes do not affect the Secretary's authorities for incentive pay, expedited hiring under section 706 of Title 38, or similar provisions.
